DOC.brief_title: Dipole Density Right Atrial Mapping Assessment Therapy In Cavotricuspid Isthmus Flutter
DOC.criteria: Age 1875 year One document occurrence typical AFL within past 6 month Be able willing sign inform consent Contraindication nonemergent interventional EP procedure Require treatment access leave atrium Had myocardial infarction within prior two month Had cardiac surgery within prior three month Intracardiac thrombus Permanent pacemaker/ICD lead in/through right atrium Clinically significant tricuspid valve regurgitation stenosis Cerebral ischemic event ( include TIA ) prior six month Pregnant Currently enrol clinical investigation Any significant uncontrolled unstable medical condition
